question: Which among the following personalities won Chameli Devi Jain award 2019?
explanation: The Chameli Devi Jain Award is given to outstanding women media persons of India. The award is named after Chameli Devi Jain (An Indian freedom fighter). Arfa Khanum Sherwani from Uttar Pradesh and Rohini Mohan from Kerala won this award in the year 2019.
